page.title: 20Law and Order
page.content: Four burglars broke into our school a few nights ago. They tried to get in with crowbars and did a lot of damage to many of the doors. The police said there were three men and one woman. They stole a casette recorder and a good deal of food from the kitchen but they did not touch the television set or the computer. They cut up our cooks sandals which was particularly vicious. I don't like being in school knowing that robbers were here it sort of gives me the creeps. The police came and checked the school for fingerprints. They took Mr Corbey's fingerprints but I don't think they suspect him because he's our a Headmaster and he seems to be an honest sort of chap. They were seen leaving the school in the early hours of the morning by the butcher but the police haven't caught them yet.
